response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. We are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This price reflects not only the high quality and functionality of the product but also the opportunity for you to acquire a piece that could potentially grow in value over time. We are confident that you will find this offer irresistible and hope to welcome you as a valued customer soon.", "product_price": 1200000}
